english_translation: Do not make what is appropriate for the people overly complex,

kannada_original: ಸುಳಿದ ಬಾಳೆಯ ತೆರದಿ ಇಡು ನೇರ ಮುಂದೆ.
english_transliteration: suḷida bāḷeya teradi iḍu nēra munde.
english_translation: place it straight forward like a peeled banana.

kannada_original: ಆಗ ಈ ಅನಿಸಿಕೆಯ ಸಂವಹನ ಬಲು ಸುಲಭ;
english_transliteration: Āga ī anisikeya saṁvahana balu sulabha;
english_translation: Then the communication of this feeling is very easy;
